import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Header from "../components/Header"; // Reusable Header Component import Footer from "../components/Footer"; // Reusable Footer Component import "../styles/menu.css"; // Import the CSS file const MenuPage = () => { return (
{/* Header with Logo and Navigation */} {/* Menu Tabs with React Router Navigation */}
{/* Menu Items */}

BRUNCH COCKTAILS

CINNAMON TOAST CRUNCH $16

Skrewball peanut butter whiskey, vanilla extract, Amaretto, Baileys, egg white, cinnamon

BAR 42 MARY $14

Titos, tomato juice, Worcestershire, celery salt, black pepper, tabasco, fully loaded

MOET SPRITZ $20

Aperol, St Germain, botanical liquor, fresh lime juice, mini brut Moet topper

{/* Footer Section */}
); }; export default MenuPage;
